TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicMetaObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示动态绑定以及参与动态绑定的对象的绑定逻辑。

span.span: Represents the dynamic binding and a binding logic of an object participating in the dynamic binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，下载[实现动态接口](https://download.microsoft.com/download/5/4/B/54B83DFE-D7AA-4155-9687-B0CF58FF65D7/implementing-dynamic-interfaces.pdf)以 PDF 格式的文章。For more information, download the [Implementing Dynamic Interfaces](https://download.microsoft.com/download/5/4/B/54B83DFE-D7AA-4155-9687-B0CF58FF65D7/implementing-dynamic-interfaces.pdf) article available in PDF format.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: expression
param.span: 在动态绑定过程中表示此 的表达式。

summary.span: 为指定对象创建元对象。

span.span: Creates a meta-object for the specified object.

returns.span: 如果给定对象实现 ，并且它不是来自当前 AppDomain 外部的远程对象，则返回由 返回的此对象的特定元对象。

span.span: If the given object implements and is not a remote object from outside the current AppDomain, returns the object's specific meta-object returned by .

returns.span: 否则，将创建并返回无限制的新的纯元对象。

span.span: Otherwise a plain new meta-object with no restrictions is created and returned.
